title: Junior & Mid Front-end/UI Engineer
description:
 Collaborate with a diverse team of Designers, Developers and Product Owners
 Communicate and present their work in a clear and simple manner
 Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code
 Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
 Develop new user-facing features using ReactJS, AngularJS
 A team player who likes to collaborate and ask questions
 Have excellent communication skills
 Flexible and has a willingness to learn and try new approaches
 Positive and able to adapt quickly to change
requirements:
 More than 1-year experience with Angular or 2 years experience with Reactjs
 2+ years of experience in user-centered design, and is confident being hands-on from initial wireframes, through prototyping, into building the final product.
 Proficiency in UI-design programs (Sketch, Omnigraffle, Balsamiq Mockups)
 Proficiency working with web technologies (Object-oriented Javascript, HTML5, CSS3)
 Experience with Javascript libraries, frameworks such as: React, Redux, Angular, Vue, etc.
 Experience with CSS pre-processing frameworks such as: SASS, LESS, PostCSS.
 Deep understanding of asynchronous.
 Experience with RESTful APIs
 Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
 Experience with code versioning tools and process
 Experience with Agile / Scrum process and tracking tools
 Familiarity with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)s.
 Familiarity with ES6.
 Good command in English
